name: Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A bestselling 3-in-1 multitasking cream that smooths sleek styles, preps shiny blowouts & defines natural soft curls..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Curl-Enhancing.- Shine.- Frizz..Key Benefits:.- Tames frizz and smooths flyaways.- Enhances, defines, and shapes natural curls.- Creates touchably soft styles, as it moisturizes and adds shine..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Dragon Fruit: Rich in antioxidants and enzymes that lock in moisture and nourish hair..- Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Antioxidants and vitamins condition hair for a soft and healthy look..- Meadowfoam Seed Oil: High moisture content restores hair to its natural, glossy luster...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Made to multitask, this styling cream smooths hair, preps for silky, shiny blowouts & defines natural curls. This clean formula is made with hydrating desert botanicals that moisturize & tame frizz for touchable, soft hair...Fragrance Description: Dae's Signature Citrus scent that is sweet, warm & citrusy - like an easy summer breeze..
ingredients: -Dragon Fruit: Rich in antioxidants and enzymes that lock in moisture and nourish hair. .-Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Antioxidants and vitamins condition hair for a soft and healthy look..-Meadowfoam Seed Oil: High moisture content restores hair to its natural, glossy luster....Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Propanediol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Dimethicone, VP/VA Copolymer, Ψ Ceteareth‐20, Fragrance, Isopropanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-73, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Hylocereus Undatus Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Moringa Oleifera Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Extract, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Phalaenopsis Amabilis Flower Extract, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.HOW TO USE 3 WAYS:.- Create smooth styles: Use a small amount on damp hair and let air dry or on dry hair as a sleek style finisher..- Prep shiny blowouts: Work in a small amount mid to ends before blow drying. .- Define natural curls: Work through wet or dry curls for definition....PRO TIP: Our styling cream doubles as an air dry treatment to tame frizz and smooth strands without heat. Apply a small amount to towel-dried hair, work through with fingers or comb, and let air dry.... Recycling Instructions:.- Just clean out the remaining product, and toss the tube and cap in the recycling bin!

I haven’t tried the other hair care products from Dae yet, but this one works perfectly on its own and can be used alongside other brands. I’ve paired it with Amika and even some drugstore products, and it consistently keeps my hair hydrated and delivers flawless waves without the crunch.

reviews.review_text: I am thrilled to share my experience with the Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream, especially since it has worked wonders for my husband’s 4C type hair. We’ve tried numerous products, but this one truly stands out!  Firstly, the definition it provides to his curls is phenomenal. Every little curl is perfectly defined without that stiff or crunchy feeling, which is often a concern with styling creams. His hair looked soft, bouncy, and full of life, making it a joy to touch!  Another highlight of this product is the smell. It has an incredible scent that is refreshing and pleasant without being overwhelming. It’s a nice bonus that makes the styling process even more enjoyable.  Overall, I would highly recommend Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream for anyone with 4C hair looking for a product that enhances curl definition while keeping the hair soft and fragrant. This has become a staple in our hair care routine, and we couldn't be happier with the results!

reviews.review_text: I have several deluxe sample sizes of this styling cream and recently received the full size as part of a hair care gratis package. I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador, based on my use on my use of this styling cream 1-2 times per week over the last 2+ months.  Hair Type: Straight, thin strands (but a lot of it) Hair Condition: Flat at crown, drier at ends. Color treated, uses heat styling tool 1-3 times per week  WHAT I LIKE: * Lightweight * Easy to use * Does not weigh hair down or make it look greasy * Leaves hair feeling lightly hydrated, soft and smooth  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * None, but I'm also not sure it stands outs against other similar products * Soften, tone down the scent - this will be a personal preference; the scent is stronger than I prefer but your mileage may vary  FYI: * Scent: sweet, candy-like scent  BUY or BYE?: * There's nothing particularly wrong with this product, but I'm not sure that there's anything that makes it stand out from other similar products. Since the scent doesn't agree with me, it's not something I would repurchase. That said, for those who are fine with stronger, sweet candy scents, this may be worth checking out.

reviews.review_title: Versatile cream for straight hair or natural curls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lightweight styling cream has an airy feel and a yummy, fruity scent. Its texture is more akin to a slushy gel moisturizer than a rich overnight cream.  It is quite versatile, smoothing my fine, blow-dried hair and giving spring and shape to my daughter’s natural 2C curls. In fact, she tells me it holds them, “Way better than the other stuff!”  I can be quite generous with how much I use, without my hair feeling weighed down or limp. My hair soaks up the moisture it provides, restoring the damage from the arid air and hard water. It also smoothes it enough that I no longer need to follow up my blow dry with a flat iron, yay for less damage!  I apply it over my entire head of hair, over styling mousse at the roots and under hair oil at the ends before blow drying. My daughter applies Aveda’s be curly advanced curl perfecting primer with the Dae cream afterwards. Using her fingers, she scrunches her curls and lets them air dry. The definition lasts throughout the day into the evening, which is just one of the reasons she prefers it to her other curl cream.   I love that we can share a product, which means less overall clutter in the drawers. Add to that the delectable scent, and it is just the right formula for us.

reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  This isn’t my first time trying the styling cream as I got 2 deluxe samples of it before from Sephora. I do love the fruity sweet smell which is the same scent as the hair mist.   After using the styling cream for a couple of months now, I found it to be just okay for my hair type (more coarse, dry, and wavy).  I have tried it on wet hair after a shower and let my hair air dry while out doing errands. I didn’t notice it enhancing my waves or helping with frizz. I did make sure to use a small amount (nickel size) and warm it in between my hands before spreading it from the middle to ends of my hair. A little goes a long way if you don’t want your hair to feel like it has too much product in it or weighing it down. I also tried it on dry hair （the next day after a hair wash）. Although I didn’t see an increase in shine it did make my hair feel a little softer. Overall it’s a good product but not a great product for my hair type.

reviews.review_text: I got to use this for free to be a product tester. The container is so cute and compact. Very easily can fit in probably any purse! I didn’t love the smell at first, it is quite strong but it dissipates really quickly. The smell itself is actually quite pleasant; it’s just really strong. The applicator brush is really cool although I have pretty fine hair so I can’t run it through my hair without it kind moving other hairs around. I also keep loose waves in my hair so I only use this at my part to manage those flyaways. I tried taking a before and after but it really didn’t do the cream justice. This is really nice for a little touch up on the run. I don’t tend to touch up my hair on the run so I use it when I initially style in the morning and leave it in my bathroom. All in all, it’s nice for a flexible hold that doesn’t look or feel like hairspray. I actually forget I’ve used it after an hour. I have really thick but fine long bleached hair. My hair tends to be pretty dry and dries frizzy, not straight or curly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Taming Wand gifted by Dae has quickly become a favorite in my haircare routine. This handy tool is perfect for managing flyaways and achieving sleek, polished looks on the go.  What I love most about it is its versatility. Whether I'm prepping for a busy day or just need a quick touch-up before heading out, the Taming Wand delivers. The formula is lightweight and doesn't leave any sticky residue, which is a huge plus. Plus, it's infused with desert-derived extracts like dragon fruit and prickly pear seed oil, so it nourishes my hair while keeping it in place.  The scent is another highlight – a delightful blend of citrusy and sweet notes that linger throughout the day. Overall, the Dae Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Taming Wand is a must-have for anyone looking to maintain effortlessly chic hairstyles with minimal fuss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and appreciate the innovation attempted here, but it simply did not work for me. I have 3c curly hair and trying to smooth my edges with this would often result in the brush getting tangled and my curls and disturbing the style. I'd really have to focus on my baby hairs with it around my hair line to try to avoid the tangling. I rarely wear my hair slicked back but the one time i did since trialing this product, it worked fairly well. I think i'd need something goopier because there were still hairs that would not lay down. I think the brush was on the right track because it's full and fluffy but i really need a dense toothbrush type of brush for my edges. I think this potentially will work for straight hair, dare i say fine stranded girlies? Would be great for an event (if the product does work for you) because it's so portable! It was my first foray into Dae products and I'd be down to try their styling cream which I think this is based on in terms of formulation and scent. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_text: This has been the frizzy hair slick back go to I’ve been looking for!! I’ve been plagued with frizzy, fly away hairs my whole life. It’s been such a burden for me. This solved my problem in two seconds. I love the packaging with the tube component. When you take the wand out of the packaging you’re greeted with such a wonderful, strong yet not overpowering sweet fruity scent. I really adore the scent. I will admit the larger wand intimidated me at first but the first stroke of putting it through my hair I got it. It’s a perfect wand. It brushes through the hair so effortlessly laying down the hairs with the perfect amount of product. It’s soft going through the hair and I don’t feel like I need to hit the same area constantly. I’ve used other similar products that left my hair crunchy or weighed down so much I felt like I needed to wash it out same day and I don’t get that with this. No crunchy! It’s super soft almost like you’d never know the product was in my hair. I can still move my fingers through my hair. I’m literally going to stick this in my purse for on the go. It did such a good job laying down the fly away that bug me on the daily. I’m BEYOND impressed with this which I rarely feel happens with hair products. I will forever be purchasing this. Gifted by date hair

reviews.review_title: Versatile styling tool for flyaways and slick buns
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying I love the OG styling cream and already used it to tame my natural waves or when doing a slicked back bun. I received the wand as part of a pre-release testing and was instantly delighted with how versatile the wand is. If you use a light hand, you can tame fly aways around a part on every day styles or with a heavier hand you can lock in slick styles. The product never weighs down my hair and leaves it feeling smooth and soft. I’ve been keeping it in my every day bag for touch ups and I can’t wait to travel with it!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the testing opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this wand and the styling cream. I have long hair that gets frizzy in humidity. I use this in my already-styled hair, to smooth stray hair and frizz. I mostly have been wearing my hair up lately, and this has been a lifesaver to make my hairstyle look polished. I wash my hair about every 3 days, and this does not make my hair oily in between washes and does not leave any residue. It does not look like I have product in my hair when I use it, it just cleans up my hairstyle. The wand is small enough to target small sections of hair, but also large enough to be effective. I used this before a job interview recently to really make sure my hair would behave for the whole afternoon, and I was impressed with the results. This is something to try if you're looking for something to help you look a little more put together on the go. I'm not a fan of the fruity scent, but it disappears after an hour.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to try this product thanks to Gloss Angeles Confidential. After 2 weeks of use, I’m happy to report how easy to use and effective this styling cream is. I have mostly straight hair that’s generally low maintenance, but it always, always has frizz no matter what I try to do to tame it or how humid it is outside. Turns out all I needed was this magic wand! The cream smells amazing but most importantly it works. This is the easiest and best way for me to completely smooth my top layer frizz. I love this on-the-go tool, and now I’ll be buying the original styling cream packaging because I need more of this cream in larger quantities in my life. Love that both options exist. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough about this Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream + Taming Wand from Dae! It's my newest must-have multi-haircare product! It can be used as a leave-in conditioner, a styling cream, and its taming wand is a great addition for flyaways, giving my hair a sleek and polished look. I have been carrying it with me in my bag for touch-ups throughout the day. This product is perfect for anyone looking to simplify their hair care routine! Complimentary from Dae.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since day one of receiving this product, it has lived in my purse and made frequent appearances it my daily mid day touch ups. I love the scent of the product, and it does linger throughout the day. It's ability to quickly fix flyawars, tame frizz and add sleeness to a pony tail or bun is not as sticky as other products but still does the job. It has a nice hold but can easily be brushed out when needed without having to wash my hair. I was skeptical of the large spoolie but found it was nice and quick to use when trying to cover large sections, but it was a bit tricky to use for smaller/ quiker touch ups. The packaging is adorable but does get a bit dirty after being thrown in a purse. Over all, I think this is one of the best product to help tame frizz and flyaways, the main sticking point for me is not feeling like I will need to wash my hair after use just to be able to style again. This is a GREAT addition to the cactus fruit styling line. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great for frizz/flyaways! Even on fine hair
