reviews.review_text: I have fine wavy hair with a ton of regrowth coming in. This product is light enough to not make my fine hair weighed down but effective to tame the curly regrowth that’s coming in. It’s perfect for on the go or travel, but I haven’t needed “reapplying” when I’ve used it in the am. Love! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A must have to do my curly hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it for a while and i have really liked it and haven’t found any flaws! I love the way it smells and how good it is for slickbacks and curly styles. Overall 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving dae’s Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling cream and wand! The styling cream doesn’t leave visible residue in your hair or leave your hair feeling sticky. I have lots of fine baby hairs that stick up all around my hairline and this product works great to get those hairs to lay flat. The wand is interesting because it’s fairly large and the bristles are soft/flexible. I found myself wanting to apply very light pressure to the wand, but applying firmer pressure to the wand is a game changer - the product performance is SO much better this way. When I applied light pressure to the wand it would get slightly tangled in my hair when I lifted it away from my head and my hair didn’t lay as flat as I would have liked. I do find myself needing to reapply the product after a few hours, but the compact size is so helpful for taking it on the go that the reapplication aspect isn’t a nuisance. I personally love the sweet citrusy scent, but it is strong (does dissipate once applied). Overall, it’s a very helpful product. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful product I didn’t know I needed! I love the stying wand to smooth my hair when it’s damp or dry. I have not noticed any issues with product build-up. It smells amazing. All the girls in my family have been using this wand to smooth flyaways, works great with a slicked back ponytail or loose hair. So versatile!! Thanks Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

I loved using this taming wand to slick down my flyaways! The product itself is quite slim and small, which made it convenient to travel with. I found it helped to apply some pressure to the wand when slicking down hairs, as a light hand wouldn't get the hairs to stay down properly. I personally did not prefer to use it for frequent reapplication because the styling cream did not layer well on my medium-thickness hair. I enjoyed the scent, which is strong and fruity, but pleasant. I wish the product worked better on my flyaways that were around an inch long, as the cream was only effective on longer hairs. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The taming wand spoolie makes all of the difference.  I have hair that is all different lengths from re-growth after a stressful few years and no longer covering my grey.  I wear my hair back or half back frequently to work and most recently to DisneyLand. This is the tool & product I didn't know I needed. It holds all the wispy flyaways and short hairs back really well without making my hair greasy or stiff and it doesn't leave a weird residue even on long theme park days. It's super easy to keep in my purse or backpack and use with a compact mirror for quick & easy application & touch-ups with the large, wide spoolie.  It never got caught in my very thick hair either which really surprised me. Nothing worse than trying to smooth out your hair only to have the tool you're using pull your hair from your bun or ponytail.  The only drawback for me is it's a very strong & sweet fragrance.  The strength of the fragrance doesn't last long but it definitely comes in powerfully. My preference is away from sweet scents so while the scent is not for me, someone else may love it.  Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never used a DAE product until my experience with this product, and it was a great introduction to the brand - packaging, scent, and performance are wonderful. I found myself using this as an alternative to hairspray to coax my curtain bangs into and then stay in place. Now I want to try the shampoo and conditioner. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am an avid user and lover of the original cactus cream. I love that it's a three in one product so it works for multiple members of my family. I use it to define waves/curls on me and my younger daughter, and I use it as a slick back cream for my older daughter who is a toddler with varying lengths of hair. It's not crunchy but it helps hold back her hair perfectly, and I use a decent amount all around her hair.  I love this new packaging design because it makes so much sense for people who want it as a slick back/anti frizz product. I use the original more rarely on myself that way because before I would have to squeeze a dollop into my hands and rub it in that way, which is messy and harder to control. With this new update, I'm way more likely to apply this way because it's so easy to apply. I don't mind having to blend in a little - it's better than having it all over my hands. And the packaging is on-the-go friendly so it will definitely be in my diaper bag ready for touch ups as any of us need it.  As someone who already uses and loves cactus cream, I know I'll be sure to have an original tube for how my family has used it in the past, but l'll also be keeping this new tube on hand for ease of use and on the go touch ups. I love it! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Cream is nice; Wand isnt for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, fine, straight hair. I tried this product on a wash day blow out, day 3 messy bun, and day 4 I should wash this hair. My opinion - I liked the cream itself and would use again.  The cream has a strong scent but its like no other hair product I've tried. The scent is very light and refreshing. I really enjoyed it. The cream feels moisturizing without being greasy and making your hair look dirty.  I will say, the wand did not work for me. I think I shed too much and my hair may be too fine for the wand. My hair would get stuck around the spoolie and it caused me to have to rip that hair off to clean the spoolie off.  I did like how the cream tamed my frizz without being greasy or sticky. It also lasted well throughout the day. My days can sometimes be 10-12 hours and this frizz lasted for most of the day. Note: this cream is not providing a lot of hold, more of a taming.  I will continue to use the cream, which was new to me, but probably not the spoolie. If you have different hair however, this packaging could be great for on-the-go. But for me I need perhaps stiffer bristles on the spoolie.  The only reason I dont recomend is the spoolie - so if you think those bristles will work for you, you should buy this.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This styling cream does a good job at smoothing flyaways. It does have a very strong scent, so I may not recommend it if you are sensitive to fragrance. The wand is like a large mascara wand, which is cool! But it can get tangled in your hair if you have thick or frizzy hair. Overall it does a good job and does not leave the hair too greasy feeling.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The styling cream is lightweight yet effective, providing a good hold without making my hair feel stiff or sticky. It helps in defining curls and waves, adding a nice texture to my hair. The cream also imparts a natural shine, which enhances the overall look of my hairstyle. The taming wand is a game-changer for dealing with flyaways and baby hairs. It's compact and easy to use, allowing for precise application. The wand helps in smoothing down those stubborn hairs, giving a polished and sleek finish to my look. It's perfect for quick touch-ups on the go, ensuring that my hair stays neat and tidy all day long. Love this product offered by daehair 💖

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally try this product because it is EXACTLY what I've been looking for - something to tame my new growth hairs along my hairline, part, and the dang little wiry gray hairs popping up.  I already used the dae Cactus Fruit Styling Cream for this purpose and loved the texture, smell and efficacy but taking the Styling Cream product and putting it in a tube with wand applicator was GENIUS and a total game changer for me!   The Taming Wand deposited the perfect amount of product on my hair and the bristles were perfection - lots of thin, flexible bristles.  On days I wrapped my hair in a bun with a claw clip I used this to tame all the little hairs along my hairline and part and it worked great.  I also took it in my purse to work with me multiple times and it traveled really well.  But the product was still working so well throughout the day I think I only reapplied one time due to an intense humidity situation.  Bonus - the smell is divine!  I honestly can't think of one thing I would change about this product.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Easy on the go styling product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It smoothes my baby hairs and corse grays without crunch, super travel friendly for easy touch ups and on the go styling. It also smells great. The spolie is a little big for my ideal preference but really convenient. Definitely a new go to for touch ups and on the go styling, baby hairs and slicked back looks. Thank you gloss angeles confidential for the opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good, just like the other ca this fruit collection!! The applicator is nice and big but if you have more curly hair it will make the curl look funny sometimes. Obsessed with the packaging and makes it so easy to travel with. This product helped with fly aways when you want your hair slicked back. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I realized how much I’ve needed it. I’ve used the gel wands for flyaways but it always left my hair looking worse and it didn’t tamed it. So I gave up on using them. This is the opposite, I love the scent and the brush helps so much getting those flyaways/frizz.  It keeps my hair tamed and doesn’t create the gel texture. My hair looks fresh/hydrated. If you love the Dae shampoo/conditioner scent this is the same! I will be repurchasing! Love that I can throw it in my bag for touch-ups! My bangs have also benefitted from the product, helps keep them in place. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a couple weeks and have really enjoyed it! I want to start by pointing out the scent. I absolutely love it! It’s a delicious, juicy, fruity scent. As much as I love it, I want to point out that it is very strong. So if you don’t like scented products, you will not enjoy it. As for the how the product tames frizz, it does a fantastic job! I expected that it would work well at my part, which it did, but I was very surprised at how well it worked for my lengths! If I combed this product down a frizzy strand of hair, it tamed the section and actually held down that frizz for hours! The product itself is a medium weight cream. Not thick like a paste, but not as thin as a gel. The application method is with a large, bendy, plastic mascara like spoolie wand. I found that the applicator picked up an appropriate amount of product. I also enjoyed that the product is stored in a tube, because I think you’ll be able to get every last ounce out of the packaging. All in all, this is a product I would highly recommend if you have frizzy hair that needs taming on specific sections. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Smells great and leaves no residue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the original Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream so was excited to try this product with a wand. I liked this product because it smells great, easy to take on-the-go and it didn't leave any residue in my brown hair. The reason I rated it a 4 is because the wand wasn't ideal for when I had my hair pulled back in a ponytail. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A styling product I didn’t know I needed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really surprised me – the little package packs a big punch. It was perfect for taming fly aways and frizz for a slicked back pony and even braids, and the applicator is super easy to use (the perfect size without delivering too much product or being clumpy). Even on day two, where I used it along my hairline, my hair was still super smooth, soft and tame, without being sticky, crunchy, or greasy, which I wasn’t expecting. I LOVE that this is a travel friendly and compact yet versatile product that can be used on the go. I find the scent of the 3in1 product to be a bit overpowering, but it did fade after the initial application and it didn’t’ really bother me as much as it did in the beginning, so I think it just takes some getting used to. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is travel-sized. It was easy to throw into any purse or bag that I have. I love that it was like a miniature version of the styling cream of dae that I already own, which I also love very much! The wand makes this product very easy to use, and I love the fruity and floral fragrance that it gives off. The smell wasn't too strong either. This is a great product for those who already love the styling cream and want something more portable. For those who haven't tried the styling cream and want to start off with something smaller, this taming wand would be a good product to start with. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product works well to define waves without leaving hair stiff.  This Is something that I’ve been looking for a long time and I finally found it! It also tames the flyaways from a fresh blowout and reduces frizz. The tube is super practical to take on the go and keep your hair tamed from the humidity. Another great thing is that it does not leave hair feeling greasy. The smell is amazing but it goes away quickly.  Overall the product deliver what it promises.  I will definitely keep using this product. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity.

reviews.review_title: Magic in a travel friendly bottle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are several things I love about this product! I love how travel friendly this is. It takes up little space in my handbag and allows for quick touch ups. The wand is a great size but you have to use pressure to apply it or it picks up hairs instead of laying them flat and taming them.  Once you get the hang of it, it works great at taming my unruly baby hairs and flyaways. The product comes out white but becomes translucent as it blends in which is great for dark hair. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a slicked-back bun type of girlie, but this dae styling cream with the wand was a perfect way to tame my bangs! Especially after the second or third day of hair, it helped with any flyaways or baby hairs, making my hair look fresh and not messy. Not to mention the scent is heavenly, I would get little whiffs throughout the day, but it's not overpowering at all. Overall, this is a great product, and the fact that you can toss it in your bag is a great bonus. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product!  I have long, fine, straight hair and am prone to flyaways and other general reactiveness when dealing with humidity or static.  I am always worried that hair products that are designed to give me the smooth/sleek look that I like are going to weigh my hair down or make it crunchy or greasy.  This did neither of those things, and truly keeps the fly aways under control, even when sitting outside in the humidity for several hours.  This product works great on second and third day hair, and doesn't leave any sort of build up or residue, which is great since I only wash my hair a few times per week.  A little goes a long way and a very light application does the trick for me.  This product works great for your hair when you want to tame it while wearing it down, and also for keeping things smooth when you are going for that slicked back look.  Not only does this product work but it also smells incredible.  I want to bottle this scent so I can smell it all the time (and for those who are concerned, the smell goes away after you apply it).  I am looking forward to continuing to see how else I can use this product, especially when the winter months are here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great on-the-go styling product that I loved having in my purse to help with my baby hairs at the back of my neck from daily pony tails, as well as the crazy hairs that seem to pop up out of nowhere on top.   I really like the brush applicator- it's light, fluffy, and flexible, and great for small area touch ups.   I appreciate the fragrance and feel on my hair as well- it's fresh and clean, and left my hair feeling clean rather than weighed down. I also love the packaging- so cute!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this testing opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dae brand itself has been on my radar for a while as they're a clean brand and when I got the opportunity to test out one of their products I was so excited. I wasn't super familiar with their full line of products, but quickly learned about their Cactus Fruit 3-1 Styling Creme being a big seller and can understand why. First of, I love the scent! It smells like summer in a bottle - fresh, fruity and citrusy. The scent is strong and overpowering so if you're not a fan of strong scents, this might not be for you, but I didn't mind it at all. I was super impressed by the wand, feels like a big mascara brush. I used it to slick back a ponytail and bun loved how all by baby hair stayed in place and didn't look greasy. I'm still practicing how to do my edges but do see it working for that too! I do feel like a little bit of products goes a long way, if not it'll feel too heavy given that it's a creme. I like it more for when I wanted a sleek-look rather than using it on my curly wavy hair although it did tame the frizz on strands. This product is meant to be used on-the-go, and do see it working that way and it's perfect for traveling given the size. Giving it four stars as I didn't see myself reaching for the product all the time, just mostly for touch ups. However, impressed with the creme product so now want to try the full-size. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A must-have for taming San Diego humidity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, Dae had me at their cute branding and beachy vibes. And this little lip gloss-esque cutie? Sold!   I have wavy 2C hair and live in San Diego, where it’s been alarmingly hot and humid this summer. This wand has been so nice for quickly taming flyaways on my part and on my bangs. The product is smoothing but doesn’t leave my hair crunchy. Really just makes my hair a bit more chic and put together, I love it!  The only downside to this product is the scent, which is quite strong and sweet. Would love something a bit lighter or more fresh. It’s sort of a cotton candy gummy bear sort of vibe?  That said, I have already purchased three new Dae products because I love this little cream so much. Looking forward to trying their shampoos and conditioners! The dry shampoo looks cute, too :)  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

The cactus styling cream is such a good product!! The smell is the most fresh delicious scent ever and a little goes a long way. I have super fine hair with baby hairs frizzing off the top and this spoolie is perfect to tame the tops of my hair. The way the spoolie distributes the perfect amount of product is helpful, especially when carrying this on the go. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A product I didn’t know I needed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have really coarse frizzy hair and most of the time I just lean into it, but lately have been wanting to try more polished styles. I’ve been using this want to smooth down hair around my face and I’ve been loving it. I thought it would weigh those pieces down or look greasy, but it’s surprisingly lightweight. It also smells absolutely amazing. The only downside for me is that I feel like I’ll go through it really quickly. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: You need this even if you think you don't
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Dae regular at this point, and use the original styling cream with styling brush regularly... but I think I'll be using this instead going forward. It's impossible to use too much of this since the spooly does such an even and light distribution of product... much better than when I try to rake through with my fingers - so I love not worrying about globs. And the spooly allows for really precise application, brushing, and raking through my hair, without messing up the style. And to just tame flyaways this is second to none. It's definitely going in my travel bag but also my daily routine. The definition of a 'I didn't know I needed this until I got it' product!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a fun and clever product! I love how it’s basically the size of a mascara, and has a little wand to help tame flyaways and achieve the perfect slicked back hairstyles of summer. Definitely my new purse buddy! Gifted by Dae

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The taming wand is great for on the go touch ups for those frizzy fly-aways that pop up after you have been running around. I have tiny hairs that always seem to grow out of my part... or maybe its breakage... either way, they must be tamed. I liked that it didn't look greasy in my fine blonde hair. The taming wand had a small learning curve- if I went too fast, it would catch in my hair when it was down. LOVE the scent. This tube would be great for traveling or if you get frizzy throughout the day!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Leaves hair smooth and soft, no crunchiness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter and I have both been trying out this product and having similar positive experiences with it. She loves a slicked back pony which this helps with, and I like a little help with keeping new growth sprouts slicked down and taming the frizz. The spoolie was hard to get used to for me, and I realized it was because I was using it lightly and my daughter was much rougher with it. My hairs would get caught in it and hers wouldn't, and it was because she applied more pressure with it. The cream smells fantastic but isn't overpowering imo, is pliable and keeps hair soft, not crunchy. I have to wash my hair the night of using it otherwise I'll get greasy, my daughter seems to be able to use it several days before washing. Will purchase again because it works great on the frizz and flyaways. Thank you Gloss Angeles for the testing opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pro I loved the applicator and tube. Very innovative! It didn't leave behind any residue in my black straight hair. I used it tame my many fly always and baby hairs. It even helped keep all my hair in place after wearing a large sun hat!  Perfect for travel and on the go touch ups. So easy to pack in your purse for a photoshoot or wedding/special occasion   Con I did not enjoy the scent of this product at all. It reminded me of something Victoria Secret or Bath and Body Works would sell. If you like those kinds of scents you will love this product. The scent is very strong and lasts all day. If this came in unscented I would 100% buy it.   Overall this product was great except for the scent. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A little luxury to fight flyaways
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a handy product to tackle flyaways on the run. The product itself is a matte cream that lasts several hours, though you'll need to apply it a few times throughout the day. It doesn't appear to make your hair look greasy or leave a residue. The brush works well for taming flyaways from the top and sides of my ponytail,  but got stuck in the underside.  I could do without the scent, which smells like fruit punch, but it's not overwhelming.  Overall, the product works fine but I don't see myself purchasing it regularly.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity to try this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First, the smell of this product is to die for! It’s very fruity and perfect for summer. Now, the product itself is such a smart concept and extremely effective when it comes to smoothing flyaways. I also love how the applicator can be removed and the product can be squeezed out of the tube and applied to the hair. I like to apply it on wet hair as a leave-in conditioner. The compact container also makes it easy to take this product in the go! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product especially on the go. I usually have to carry a small brush or spoolie with some product to tame my flyaways but this is perfection when putting my hair up in a bun or letting my hair down. I just pop the product in my purse and ready to go.  I love the scent but might be strong for folks who have an aversion to strong scents, but the scent fades after time. It works beautifully with dry shampoo as well!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Formula & wand are game changing! HIGHLY recommend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed by this product! The formula works very well and the taming wand is genius - it's a big spoolie which made it really easy to use. It's a heavily scented product (so FYI if you are sensitive to fragrance), but I personally LOVE the scent. My neighbor tried it when I was testing and she immediate went out and purchased it herself. If you put too much on, you may need to rub in the product a little (which is no big deal to me and a big improvement to all the rest of my products that I apply with my hands), but formula-wise, it WORKS and it doesn't get hard or crunchy either. Highly recommend and will re-purchase when empty!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: As someone not familiar with Dae products, I was excited to be gifted this product for testing. I love the scent of this product but it is quite strong if you’re sensitive to that. I like the ease of application with the wand applicator. That being said, I can’t use this product when my hair is already up because it tugs at the strands and pulls them out of my style. But I can easily run it through my hair first and then pull my hair back and smooth out with my hands. I wish that it didn’t tug though because then it would be better for touch ups throughout the day. I like that the product doesn’t feel too heavy and I don’t feel like I need to add a wash day after use. Overall I enjoy this product for styling and will continue to use it! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great product idea, just not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is amazing, with the wand and tube being great for taming flyaways on the go! However, the formula left my fine hair looking a little greasy. I was only able to use it when I was really going for a slicked back look.  Also, I can be a bit l sensitive to smells and for me the scent was just too strong and sweet. I kept getting whiffs all day when I used the product, so if you like the scent it really does last! Overall I loved testing the product, I just think it would be best for those with thicker hair who enjoy a sweet scent in their hair all day long.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First impressions/stand-out aspect of this product: the scent is lovely! It's fruity and while it seems strong, in my experience it didn't linger so it didn't clash with other fragrances I was wearing. My hair is long and naturally wavy, and I typically wear it down so this was used mostly if my hair was in a bun/ponytail. I found that the wand component of this didn't play well with my long hair, as it would end up getting stuck or tangled if I applied any pressure on it. However the wand did a good job of taming flyaways when I'd do a slicked back look.   Eventually I ended up using the wand mainly to deposit the product, and then using my fingers to blend if too much got into an area. Luckily the white cream was not an issue in my very dark hair.  I do like that the size of the tube is very travel/purse-friendly, but realistically I'll probably end up using the wand sparingly for light touch-ups and will squeeze out a bit of the product directly onto my hand to smooth my ends.   If you're looking for hold, this product isn't it...I found that this was a nice product for immediate smoothing or touch-ups, but not long-lasting hold.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cool little product, perfect to toss in your purse or gym bag. I love the soft, flexible spoolie and the light, non-sticky, non-greasy texture of the cream itself. On my hair (fine-ish, wavy-ish) it worked perfectly to slick down flyaways when wearing it up. Gives a very sleek, clean look without looking crunchy or greasy.  I found I reached for it less when wearing my hair down. The spoolie applicator was less useful for that purpose, and it made it easy to over-apply. But one could very easily wipe some product from the spoolie and use hands to apply it.  Something to note is that it does have a noticeable fragrance. I enjoy the fragrance a lot, so I didn't mind that it lingered, but if you are sensitive to that sort of thing it's something to consider.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by daehair.Ok first of all the scent is just devine. This stuff really helps keep the flyaways at bay. The little brush helps a lot. I like how I can have a perfect slick bun as it smooths frizz. I like the packaging too makes it easy to carry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I am a huge fan of Dae and this rocks! I love a slick back style but I have so many baby hairs that frizz up especially in summer heat and no gels hold them down but this one does amazing and the applicator is so helpful! Love! This was gifted by daehair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The classic dae we all know and love! I love how innovative and practical this is. It’s small so it can fit in a purse for quick on the go. The product itself does hold fly aways down without leaving any residue behind.Gifted by DAE hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an unbiased review. TBH, this product could not have come at a better time. I’m several months postpartum and my regrowth is sticking straight up all around my hairline and part. Grateful it’s growing back, but not excited about the current look!  This stuff is perfect for taming all of those unruly hairs and getting them to lie flat. Loved that it wasn’t too thick and didn’t leave my hair sticky, crunchy or weighed down. The scent was an instant love (and I’m very picky about fragrance). And the portability is genius! She now lives in my purse for on-the-go application.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My honest review for DAE Cactus 3 in 1 styling cream plus taming wand.  First of THANK YOU for including the taming wand, it helps make such a difference. I have been using on my hair as well as my daughters hair for a few weeks and we both love it.   Gifted by DAE

reviews.review_title: Great for taming hair on the go!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to test from Gloss Angeles confidential and have found that this product is a game changer for me. I live in a very humid area and you never know when moisture in the air will make your hair frizz. This product is fantastic, it really works to tame flyaways.The size is perfect to keep in your bag for touch ups on the go. The spoolie is a bit oversized but I think it applies the perfect amount to the hair and keeps you from over applying the product. The smell is glorious and does linger for a bit, if you do not enjoy the scent I do find it dissipates after an hour or so. I am on a healthy hair journey and this really helps tame all my new baby hairs and is great for slicked back styles as well as everyday hairstyles. Thank you Gloss Angeles for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great new twist on a somewhat traditional product.  The styling wand is very similar to a mascara wand, and as someone with straight hair took a minute to figure out how to put this product to its best use.  I have a good chunk of random flyaways and frizzy ends when things get humid.  This product is small enough to toss into your purse and carry around for quick touch-ups.  Just glide the wand on the untamed flyaways and smooth with your fingers and boom you've got smooth hair.  This is a bit more fragranced than I would typically like but it does smell pretty and I liked the scent.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I surprisingly really liked this product! I don’t do the slicked back bun, so I assumed it wasn’t going to be for me, but I was wrong. I have wavy, frizzy hair and I used this product while it was up and down. When it was up, the wand worked really well to tame my baby hairs, and when it was down it worked really well to tame my flyaways around my part. The wand is like a big mascara wand and is very flexible. It distributes just the right amount of product if you use a light hand. And the smell! I didn’t wear perfume on the days I used this because the smell was so good and strong enough that those around me could smell it. That being said, if you don’t like strong fragrances in your hair products, you may not like this. Overall, I really enjoyed using this product and will continue to do so. I loved the smell, how effective it was at taming my frizz, how long lasting it was, and I liked being able to still run my fingers through my hair after using it. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great for taming second day waves!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with wavy hair and long bangs that make a slicked back bun look nearly impossible, I was initially skeptical of whether this product would fit into my hair styling routine. After spending some time with it, I was pleasantly surprised! I have mostly type 2A/2B wavy hair with some 2C spirals in front. Day 2 hair is always a challenge - if I leave my 2C bangs out, they fall flat, but if i pull them back, i'm stuck with a ton of frizz. The taming wand worked WONDERS in both of these situations and left me with defined wavy bangs (I ran the wand down each clump using my finger to help keep it from getting tangled, let dry, and gently scrunched) or a frizz-free slicked back look, depending on how I styled that day. The tube was also great for slipping into my purse for on-the-go touch-ups. The only downside that I encountered was that some shedded hairs got caught in the wand after applying, which required some care to remove. I could also see the scent of the 3-in-1 cactus cream, which I personally like, not mixing well with scents in other products. Downsides are easily outweighed by how well the product worked for me. I'm excited to have it in my second day hair routine! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a couple of weeks now and am really liking it. There is a bit of a learning curve with the wand, but I’ve been able to make it work for me. This seems best-suited for creating a not-that-slicked-back look for a ponytail or braid rather than for flyaways when wearing hair down (though could be used for that if lightly applied from the fingers rather than the spoolie). The scent is fruity and pleasant, and goes away after a few minutes. Hold is good: medium-strong, but doesn’t hold a cast/look like there’s a lot of product in the hair. I can reapply during the day and don’t get product buildup or flaking. The tube is lightweight and portable, making it perfect for touchups. I will repurchase this once it runs out!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this product for taming/smoothing the flyaways on top of my head and for styling my baby hairs around my face. At 10 months postpartum, my re-growth is at an awkward length, and this product was fantastic for styling the hair around my face because there was no crunchy/stiff look OR feel. I loved that I could use it on freshly washed hair and not have to worry about it looking greasy. The product brushed out easily and my hair still felt clean and soft after using. That said, I do wish the spoolie was a little shorter and more stiff. The super long, flexible wand was a little difficult to control and lacked the ability to grab the hair around my neckline for up-dos. One of the best parts of this product is the smell - it is clean, fruity, and lingered a bit which I enjoyed. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, wavy hair. My biggest battle is midday frizzy hair. I used this product like I would a hair oil - to scrunch out the crunch and to smooth my hair after air drying.   It eliminated nearly all of my frizz and left no greasy residue at all. I only used a very small amount of product to de-frizz my whole head of hair.  The scent is DIVINE. Very fruity and fresh. The scent did not last long, however, which I appreciated.  Cons: my wavy hair did not work well with the spoolie applicator. The spoolie tended to snag my curls and stretch them. The solution was easy: instead of using the spoolie directly on my hair, I just wiped the spoolie onto my fingertips and then applied the cream to my hair using my hands. Worked great, and my hands weren’t sticky afterward.  The small size of the packaging is ideal to keep in work tote.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This styling cream with the taming wand is absolutely genius! I have baby hairs all along my hairline and I used to just ignore them. Now I can use this product to take care of them. The taming wand glides easily over my hair and disperses just the right amount of product. My baby hairs don’t stand a chance with this amazing cream. This styling cream is perfect for on the go because of the slim size. This cream smells so delicious and makes my hair smell amazing for the whole day. I love that this cream doesn’t weigh my fine hair and doesn’t make it look greasy. This is an amazing product!! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you already enjoy using the DAE cactus styling cream then you will love this as well. This is essentially a mini size version that is convenient and great for on the go. However this new version comes with a spoolie type brush connected to the cap. This brush is truly what has stepped up the product because it very easily catches all your flyaways and baby hairs and coats them with the cream perfectly slicking them back. It has the beautiful scent of the original cactus cream as well which is an added bonus. Normally I love the trending look of a slick back bun or updo but I have fine blonde hair and typical sprays and gels can leave it darker looking in color and “crunchy.” What I love about this product is that I have no crunchiness or extra weight in my hair after and it feels like it’s actually nourishing my hair. I do think it helps you to achieve that very sleek slicked back look but I will say my hair definitely starts to fall out of the style a bit, being that it is so fine, after a few hours. I think if your hair is a little thicker in consistency or courser in texture this would be less problematic. I do wish they had a version for finer hair that was a little stronger, but this product is still effective and I do love not feeling like I have to immediately wash my hair after use. I even feel comfortable using this on freshly washed hair! What would be great now is if they added the spoolie brush cap to the full size. Leaving you the option of still using a larger quantity to apply to your whole head or the brush method to just tame those pesky flyaways. However this small size is definitely more portable and I do see this more as a touch up on the go product. Definitely worth the purchase for the innovative brush and portability. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used a product like this before but instantly fell in love with it! It's the perfect item to help tame my frizzy hair and keep shorter regrowth hairs in place. I love the wand as it makes the product super easy to apply and not have to get the styling cream on my hands. It's a nice size to bring with you on the go without taking up much room in your bag for every day or while traveling. I liked the scent of it but it could be a little strong at first but does go down shortly after applying. I used this to help slick back my hair for a low bun as I always have flyaways, it kept them in place without making my hair feel greasy. I also used it on fresh clean hair with a blowout on my roots for the parts I notice get a little frizzy and puffy throughout the day. I have a natural wave in my hair and the wand of it was fine for me to brush through my texture but I could see it being harder to use on curlier hair. Overall I love this product as it does exactly what it needs to do while the compact size makes it great for travel. I will now also purchase their normal styling cream to use at home as I loved the formulation of this. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: My cowlick has met its match!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're someone who, like me, suffers from an unfortunately-placed cowlick right along the hairline that perpetually sprouts little baby hairs, then this product is for you!  It was always tough to find the right product to tame those bad boys down - the product was either not strong enough to tame, felt too heavy or greasy, tamed the hair but in a very shellacked way, made me breakout along the hairline, etc. But this magical little tube did the trick! I found myself reaching for it on a daily basis specifically to help with my cowlick and help those short hairs lay nicely. It seemed to last throughout the day, but the tube makes it easy to touch up if needed. The other nice thing about the formula is that my hair still felt soft, not crunchy or stiff after using so if I happened to go to bed with the product in my hair, all was completely fine the next morning. No breakouts or weird residue that had me feeling like I needed to wash my hair to get the product out.  The one thing I'll say is that it had more of a flexible hold for me, so it wasn't really the best when I wanted to get that slicked back look (I still rely on a pomade stick for that), but as for helping me tame flyaways on a daily basis, this will definitely be my go-to.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product does everything it claims! My fly-aways were tamed :) This is great for a slick back bun. I was worried it could make my roots look greasy, but you can’t even tell the product is on your hair- exactly what you want. Thank you Gloss Angeles for this testing opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely perfect for taming flyhaways and a must have for humid summer times! i lolve this and am buying another one! smells good too! gifted by dae

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect to keep in your purse for on-the-go touch-ups. I love the big flexible wand and you don't need a heavy touch to see results. For me, a little went a long way. I have big wavy/curly hair and I felt the taming wand worked best for pulled back looks when I wanted no fly-away's. It worked perfectly in the humid summer heat! The scent is super-fruity and it sticks around for awhile. So, if you are fragrance sensitive I'd give it a sniff in the store to see if you can handle it.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the concept, just not the best execution for my specific hair type…I have bangs so it doesn’t exactly help with slicking back my hair. However, I did use it on the hairs on the back of my neck when I put my hair up, and it worked as advertised! I think all in all the product is great for slick back hairstyles, just not for me. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a product I wasn’t sure would be useful, but I enjoyed it and it works! I have 2b/2c hair and lots of little frizzies and flyaways. This product was able to tame them without weighing my hair down or making it look greasy. This product smelled amazing! My only complaint is the spoolie, I wish it was just a tube I could apply with my hands. Other than that, though, I loved this product and would consider buying it in the future! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a fan of the dae cactus fruit sent, so I enjoyed that the scent was present in the wand. The wand was a great size and allowed me to be detailed but also didn't get tangled in my thick hair. My hair stayed tamed and in place for almost all day long in the summer heat.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great Product - Just Not For Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this would be a really wonderful product for a lot of people but unfortunately it is just not for me. I have really fine hair that I rarely wear in sleek hairstyles so the product is not ideal for my hair type or the styles I do. When using products to control fly aways, I typically go for something less moisturizing and with more hold. As for the product itself, the smell is incredible - I kept catching whiffs of it throughout the day and loved the scent it left behind. Additionally, I appreciate all the thought put into the packaging and applicator. The applicator is large and fluffy and does a great job of distributing the product. Since this is the same formula as their styling cream, I also love that the product is in squeezable tube so that there is no product waste. If you are looking for something more moisturizing to help with fly aways, I think this would be a wonderful product but unfortunately just didn't work for me. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I live in the lowcountry where the humidity is no joke and this on-the-go product is perfect for touch-ups throughout the day.  Plus, it smells like a dream!  I use it in combination with an anti-humidity spray and it helps ensure my hair doesn't get too frizzy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a hit for me!! The only thing I had issue with was using it after I curled my hair, it took my curls right out. Any other hairstyle that had fly-aways, it was perfect for!  The scent was very reminiscent (to me) of VS-Love Spell, brought me back to the early aughts. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG it smells so good! It really does tame your hair. I love that I can just throw it in my purse and take it with me anywhere. It's super convenient for touch-ups on the go. The packaging is also really cute and practical. It was gifted by Daehair and I am so happy to have received it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for a few weeks and I highly recommend it! I live in Nebraska (where the summers are very humid) and have fine hair that reacts to humidity. This is a perfect product to use during the summer to tame fly aways and frizzy hair after I initially style. Some of the aspect of the product I loved are: 1.) I love the packaging - it is cute, easy to open and is in a flexible bottle so you can get the most out of the product - it small and you can easily carry it along throughout your day. 2.) The product smells great - very fruity!, 3.) The product is easy to use - the wand allows for the perfect amount of product to be used to the targeted areas of use. 4.) My hair was not weighed down by the product or looked greasy - I am always weary about using styling creams because of my fine hair, and this cream works great on my fine hair. 5.) It is long lasting! Fly aways do stay put. Overall, I will be repurchasing this product!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity.

reviews.review_title: A new way to tame flyaways
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this product as part of Gloss Angeles Confidential several times and here's what happened. I have wavy to curly shoulder length hair. I have lots of baby hairs and flyaways - thanks to hair regrowth products like Nutrafol. So I'm always trying to tame those when I pull my hair back. I tried one of those wax sticks but didn't like the texture and felt it was too heavy. Then I tried Dae's new product. I've never used anything from Dae before. This cream with the wand is a great idea, and overall it works very well to tame those hairs that always stick up. It even holds longer strands in place and definitely gives you that slicked back shiny look. Also, the cream melts into my hair - never sticky or crunchy. I was hoping I could use it on the go for when I wear my hair down and it gets frizzy, but it didn't work to do that and in fact made my hair frizz more. The spoolie applicator is a fantastic way to get the product on - no mess! But some hair gets picked up in the brush and the brush deposits way more cream that I need or want. There's also a lot of product left on the brush even after I apply the cream. Overall I like this - easy to use, gets the job done and is a perfect size for travel or tossing in your handbag and nice scent. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product! I love dae's OG styling cream but this is the icing on the cake for my stubborn baby hairs! I love the scent of this product! It smells like so yummy I almost want to eat it haha! I have appreciated that this product doesn't leave any residue my hair looks sleek and smells sweet! I wish the want had thinner bristles so I can use it to style my baby hair edges but other than that this product is a must for everyday or on the go! I'm taking it to Cancun this week and I just know it's gonna have me looking right!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this taming wand! As someone with very fine, blonde hair, I am always skeptical of styling creams or gels that feel heavy. This was very lightweight and SO effective! I used it to tame baby hairs that are growing back in around my temple, and it looked so natural without feeling heavy or greasy. I love it!  And the smell is to die for. Seriously, I want everything I own/wear to smell like this cream does!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the idea of this product. The wand is very easy to use, and it definitely helped to tame the little (ahem, gray) hairs that stick up out of my part. I have pretty fine hair, but those little hairs have a mind of their own. It was really convenient and portable -- I kept it in my purse to carry around with me while I was trying the product out.  The actual styling cream had a nice consistency but was just a bit too heavy for my hair type. While I know the fragrance of the product appeals to a lot of people, it just wasn't for me.  Overall, I might night repurchase, but I am definitely going to keep it at my desk to help tame my pesky frizz. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is perfect for keeping in your purse to touch-up flyaways throughout the day. I used this on both myself and my 8 y/o daughter to help keep our hair smooth. I love that it was greasy or leave a residue in my hair. The signature DAE smell is my favorite.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a person with wavy and always frizzy hair I always have flyaways. This Cactus Fruit 3-in-1 Styling Cream + Taming Wand has been so helpful since I’ve been using brow gels before I got it. It’s easy to carry around, perfectly fits in my pocket and takes little space in my purse. Would recommend everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was the product I didn’t know I needed until I saw it and now, I cannot live without it!  It is so handy to have to tame frizz and flyaways for a slicker and more polished look.  The taming wand applies the perfect amount product on my hair, so my style is contained but does not look greasy.  It is the perfect size to carry in my purse so I can reapply when needed.  I spent a few days on the beach, and it was perfect to reapply after my wet hair dried into a frizzy mess after swimming.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great for fly aways when hair is pulled back!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had the opportunity to test this product for a few weeks now and really enjoyed it. However, it won't replace all my frizz taming products. I live in MN, so it's currently hot and humid as we're mid July, and I have a natural wave in my hair that is prone to frizz when the heat and humidity rises. During this time of year I tend to wear my hair pulled back a ton (just no point in heat styling for it to fall flat), and the styling cream makes slicking my hair back a breeze. The product comes with a large, fluffy spoolie to apply the cream and it makes it very easy and fast to lay down any baby hairs and frizz. The scent is light and fruity, but not strong and fades quickly. The package is also about the size of a lip balm tube so it's really easy to toss in your bag for touch ups. The cream itself dries down but still is soft and flexible and doesn't look or feel wet and/or crunchy, and I can easily brush through my hair later in the day. It also washed out super easily but did require washing after 2 days (which I do anyway). I also used this to smooth away frizz after heat styling my hair with a blowout and with loose waves with a curling iron. This product works well to tame frizz at the roots, but gets stuck in my curls, not making it ideal to tame frizz on my lower head of hair. I also wore my hair with my natural waves and really found this product incredibly difficult to try and apply. The spoolie kept getting stuck in any wave or kink in my hair. Overall I really liked this on days I was pulling my hair back, or wearing down in a blow out or curled, but found the application just did not work for texture in hair, which us why I gave a star off. I would repurchase but mainly for wearing my hair pulled back.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A must have for summer frizz!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought I’d be able to attain the “clean girl” slicked back look because my hair is frizz central (thick + wavy), especially in the summertime. This product really does tame my frizz, is incredibly easy to apply, and smells amazing! Love that it doesn’t leave my hair feeling crunchy either. Takes a few tries to get the hang of, but overall, totally recommend this product and carry it in my purse for touch ups. Only complaint is sometimes my hair gets stuck in the spoolie but might just be user error. Otherwise, I’m a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for on the go touch ups!! After I use hairspray or another styling g product at home to tame fly aways- there is always a couple hairs the pop up when I get to where I’m going and the wand is super flexible and soft that it tames only the hairs I need it to. Occasionally a little blob will come out on the wand but it is super easy to pat in. I like how the cream doesn’t make my hair feel or look greasy and is still wearable the next day.   I have tried the styling cream in the regular packing and never found a way I liked to use it. The scent is nice and can be a little strong but the scent is not noticeable with the taming wand packaging because you are not using a lot.   This is a great product for taming a few fly aways after using other stronger products. I tried this as the main product to tame flyaways and at that point would be easier to use the product in the original packaging. When I used this before working out or in the wind my fly aways popped up so I wouldn’t say this is a ‘strong hold’ product. If there is not a lot of product on the wand or if you move the wand  in multiple directions it will get caught in your hair. I love the size and it easily fits in my bag!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product for my specific type of hair! I have fine hair but a good amount of it. It’s quite straight, and I use this product when I have a slick back look to tame flyaways. My favorite thing about this product is that it has none of the crunch or hard texture of other more wax’y or gel like products or sticks; it feels amazing on your scalp. It’s very easy to use and extremely travel friendly. The wand is flexible and quite large, which might be problematic for people with wavier or thicker hair, as it sometimes got caught in my flyways, but is also a benefit for me with a slicked back look for easy maintenance. What I didn’t like about the product was the very strong fruity scent, but it did dissipate quickly. I also didn’t love that when I tried to tame flyaways with my hair down, it took the texture and the wave out of my hair so I couldn’t keep it styled the way I wanted. In general, this is a great solution that I haven’t found on the market yet for my specific usage and I would purchase! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by daehair. I'm using this product every morning to style my daughter's hair. Love it, love it, love!!! My love become so much easier after I got this styling product. It's easy to use and hold hair for a whole day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This required a very light touch to tame down flyaways. It seems primarily geared towards slick backs but I mainly wear my hair down and it did a good job of getting frizzies near the part down without weighing down. I used it on mostly clean, day one hair and it didn’t cause any greasiness for day two and on hair.   This works best for me as spot control for problem spots—it wouldn’t be enough to replace my normal anti-humidity and frizz creams. It does provide some extra care and is good for touch ups.   The scent is good—fruity and summery but also very strong.  It does seem a little pricey for the amount but a little has been going a long way.   I received this from Gloss Angeles Confidential. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t used anything like this before. I have fine straight hair and this takes care of all the little flyaway hair without weighing it down.
